wadagath thinduwak widhiyata aragena thiyenawa. 1948 indalama dawantha deshapalana charitha haraha giyapu krushikarma amathi namawaliyama me wishaya pilibanda ithihasaya sama rajayakma warthamana agamathithuma athulu me siyaludena pilibanda salaka balimedi kisiyam jathika mimmak, wadagathkame mimmak aragena thibena bawa pahadili yayi da yauwana ha nipunatha sanwardhana amathi dalas alahapperuma mahatha pereda (13) thelijjawiladi pawasiya.hamawelawema shilachara deshapalanagnyayekge, manawa hithawadiyekuge, ratata aadaraya karana minihekge athe me wishayaya randawanna me rate sama rajya nayakayekma ithihasaye nidahasin passe aarambhaye indalama katayuthu karala thiyenawa.mahinda rajapaksha janadhipathithuma me gaurawaniya wishayaya mahinda yapa mahatha wetha pawarimedi balaporoththu wenna aththeth ema karanayamayi.
eeth kipadenek hema hitiye me kathawe end eka gana nokkaduweni.

ithipiso bhagawa buddho - apa bhagyawathun wahanse , bhayankara wu sasara dukada , sasara duka hata ganimada , sasara duka nathi kirimada , sasara duka nathi karana magada yana , madhyama prathipadawa namathi , chathurarya sathyaya dharmaya , wata thunakin dolos ayurakin , manawa awabodha kota , anyange awabodhaya pinisada , deshana kala heyin , buddha nam wana seka .

mehidi thawath prashnayak bawata pathwuye yam aakarayakin e.ja.pa. kruthyadhikari mandalaye chandayakadi ehi yam pirisak podu apekshakayata erehiwa chandaya bhawitha kirima thula perala emagin e.ja.pa. kruthyadhikari mandalaye eekamathika kamaththa nomathi podu apekshakayaku mahinda rajapaksha paradanne keseda yana tharkaya aanduwa desin idiripath kala haki bawaya.
